message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $12,000 is a bit outside my budget. I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?
